title: BRIEF-Astoria Investments Sells Interest In Apollo Natural Resources Partners II
text:
BRIEF-Astoria Investments Sells Interest In Apollo Natural Resources Partners II

Stock Markets 19 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 13:41)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Astoria Investments Sells Interest In Apollo Natural Resources Partners II Sept 27 (Reuters) - Astoria Investments Ltd ATIL.MZ : * DISPOSAL OF INTEREST IN APOLLO NATURAL RESOURCES PARTNERS II, L.P. * ASTORIA LP HOLDS A LIMITED PARTNER INTEREST IN PARTNERSHIP AND AIV'S REPRESENTING A COMMITTED AMOUNT OF USD 5 MILLION * THROUGH UNIT ASTORIA LP HOLDINGS ENTERED INTO CONDITIONAL SALE AND PURCHASE AGREEMENT WITH CORONATION GROUP INVESTMENTS

BRIEF-Astoria Investments Sells Interest In Apollo Natural Resources Partners II
description: BRIEF-Astoria Investments Sells Interest In Apollo Natural Resources Partners II
